name: DeepResearch联网搜索助手
description: 输入研究主题，系统自动执行多轮联网搜索，聚合权威来源并生成专题报告。

config__parameters.name: config__output_shape
config__parameters.label: 参数
config__parameters.tooltip: 定义工作流需要的输入参数，可以选择多种格式

config__parameters.name: config__input_ports
config__parameters.label: 输入端点
config__parameters.tooltip: 输入参数的数量，需保证与输入参数数量保持一致

config__parameters.name: config__input_shape
config__parameters.label: 输入参数
config__parameters.tooltip: 用于调用或输入工具的参数，可添加至工具中

config__parameters.name: payload__algorithm
config__parameters.label: 算法

options.label: React
options.desc: React（思考-行动-观察循环）：模型逐步推理并交替调用工具，根据每步观察结果动态调整决策，适合实时交互和链式思维任务。

options.label: ReWoo
options.desc: ReWoo（反演-重写-工具优化）：模型先生成初步答案，再判断是否借助工具优化输出，突出结果导向和后验改写能力。

options.label: PlanAndSolve
options.desc: PlanAndSolve（计划-执行分离）：模型先整体规划任务执行步骤，再依计划逐步调用工具，适合多阶段、结构化问题求解。

config__parameters.tooltip: 模型选择工具的推理过程

resources.name: 联网搜索-search
resources.title: 联网搜索-search
resources.desc: Performs a web search for a given query using the public SearXNG search servers. Returns an array of result objects with 'url' and 'summary' for each result.
resources.description: Performs a web search for a given query using the public SearXNG search servers. Returns an array of result objects with 'url' and 'summary' for each result.

config__parameters.name: detailed
config__parameters.label: Optionally, if true, will perform a more thorough search - will ask for more pages of results and will merge results from multiple servers. Warning: this might overload the servers and cause errors. Do not set to true by default unless explicitly asked to perform a detailed or comprehensive query.
config__parameters.description: Optionally, if true, will perform a more thorough search - will ask for more pages of results and will merge results from multiple servers. Warning: this might overload the servers and cause errors. Do not set to true by default unless explicitly asked to perform a detailed or comprehensive query.

config__parameters.name: language
config__parameters.label: The optional language code for the search (e.g., en, es, fr).
config__parameters.description: The optional language code for the search (e.g., en, es, fr).

config__parameters.name: time_range
config__parameters.label: The optional time range for the search, from: [day, week, month, year].
config__parameters.description: The optional time range for the search, from: [day, week, month, year].
